thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Discovery Communications Receives U.S. Department Of Justice Clearance To Acquire Scripps Networks Interactive

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Discovery Communications Receives U.S. Department Of Justice Clearance To Acquire Scripps Networks Interactive
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Discovery Communications Inc:
* DISCOVERY COMMUNICATIONS RECEIVES U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE CLEARANCE TO ACQUIRE SCRIPPS NETWORKS INTERACTIVE
* DISCOVERY COMMUNICATIONS INC - TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE BY END OF Q1 2018
* DISCOVERY COMMUNICATIONS - DEAL CLOSE REMAINS SUBJECT TO COMPLETION OF REVIEW IN IRELAND, SOME OTHER CONDITIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
